text: Jim Marurai (9 July 1947 â€“ 5 November 2020) was a Cook Islands politician. He was the 8th Prime Minister of the Cook Islands from 2004 to 2010. He was a member of the Democratic Party. In March 2020 Marurai went missing from his home but was found after two days. Marurai died on 5 November 2020 in Mangaia, Cook Islands at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime ministers of the Cook Islands
title: Jim Marurai
